## Trial Design Example

The R2OpenBUGS code serves as a clinical trial design example to obtain the posterior distribution for power in the design of a two-arm cluster randomized trial using the symbolic two-step method.

## Example Included in Manuscript:

Zahrieh D, Kandler BW, Le-Rademacher J (Under Review). The symbolic two-step method applied to cancer care delivery research: Safeguarding against designing an underpowered cluster randomized trial with a continuous outcome.
